医疗债务与人口健康和死亡率增加有关美国医疗债务与人口健康结果之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/Medical-debt-is-linked-with-population-health-and-increased-mortality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/Medical-debt-is-linked-with-population-health-and-increased-mortality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=580946e3-943c-4059-9761-2d86e3b17d09 Thu, 07 Mar 2024 05:09:00 -0500 Medical debt is associated with population health and increased mortality
质谱分析和糖生物学 - 有哪些遗传应用？在 omg OMx 播客的新一集中，Kate Stumpo 向 Chris Taron 讲述了他在糖生物学方面的经验、质谱在该领域的应用以及对基因研究的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/Mass-spectrometry-and-glycobiology-what-are-the-genic-applications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/Mass-spectrometry-and-glycobiology-what-are-the-genic-applications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de37738a-8eb8-472f-a29d-1fee24e0e058 Thu, 07 Mar 2024 05:07:00 -0500 Mass spectrometry and glycobiology - what are the genetic applications?
你运动时化妆吗？新研究揭示了对皮肤和毛孔的影响一项新的研究报告了在跑步机上锻炼时化妆后皮肤变化的干预研究结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/Do-you-wear-makeup-while-you-exercise-New-research-reveals-the-effects-on-skin-and-pores.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/Do-you-wear-makeup-while-you-exercise-New-research-reveals-the-effects-on-skin-and-pores.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=02872eda-ff8d-49b1-9447-fd96ddb31a5a Thu, 07 Mar 2024 05:03:00 -0500 Do you wear makeup while you exercise? New research reveals the effects on skin and pores
报告称，人们晚年的心理健康受到系统性和人际年龄歧视的影响最近的心理健康中心简报记录了有关英格兰老年人心理健康状况以及他们获得的支持类型的证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/Report-claims-mental-health-of-people-in-later-life-has-been-overshadowed-by-systemic-and-interpersonal-ageism。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/Report-claims-mental-health-of-people-in-later-life-has-been-overshadowed-by-systemic-and-interpersonal-ageism。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a571c9ec-c041-45b6-8ee4-6de069ec72c5 Thu, 07 Mar 2024 04:42:00 -0500 Report claims mental health of people in later life has been overshadowed by systemic and interpersonal ageism
吸烟者对电子烟危害的看法恶化，与对香烟的担忧相当或超过过去十年，英国吸烟者对电子烟危害的看法有所恶化，认为电子烟危害低于香烟的人数显着下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Smokers-views-on-e-香烟-harm-worsen-matching-or-exceeding-concerns-for-香烟.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Smokers-views-on-e-香烟-harm-worsen-matching-or-exceeding-concerns-for-香烟.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=138f8784-32f5-419a-9213-bbd8e984b92d Wed, 06 Mar 2024 22:59:00 -0500 Smokers' views on e-cigarette harm worsen, matching or exceeding concerns for cigarettes
研究揭示了中性粒细胞中隐藏的意想不到的复杂程度3月5日，中国科学院上海免疫与感染研究所（SIII）张晓明教授和张晓明教授在《Cell》杂志上发表了一项研究。复旦大学的高强、范佳和杨莉发现了中性粒细胞中隐藏的意想不到的复杂程度，此前人们认为中性粒细胞是相对均匀的短寿命免疫细胞群。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Study-uncovers-unexpected-level-of-complexity-hidden-within-neutropils.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Study-uncovers-unexpected-level-of-complexity-hidden-within-neutropils.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4980fd0b-1530-4cae-9053-c1c276e13cf8 Wed, 06 Mar 2024 22:51:00 -0500 Study uncovers unexpected level of complexity hidden within neutrophils
研究人员发现预测不吸烟成年人吸电子烟的心理因素奥塔哥大学的研究人员发现了三个心理因素，可以预测不吸烟者是否会开始吸电子烟。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Researchers-discover-psychological-factors-that-predict-vaping-uptake-in-non-smoking-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Researchers-discover-psychological-factors-that-predict-vaping-uptake-in-non-smoking-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5b2ffb4-e95a-4932-ba8b-747f7aa8d0d0 Wed, 06 Mar 2024 22:46:19 -0500 Researchers discover psychological factors that predict vaping uptake in non-smoking adults
关于病毒如何破坏心脏功能并导致心源性猝死的新见解VTC 弗拉林生物医学研究所的科学家们对有时会影响心脏的致命病毒感染有了新的认识，这是一项可能改变游戏规则的进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/New-insights-into-how-viruses-disrupt-heart-function-and-lead-to-sudden-cardiac-deaths.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/New-insights-into-how-viruses-disrupt-heart-function-and-lead-to-sudden-cardiac-deaths.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7b69ef4f-87c6-4537-a3df-6b2a864f6525 Wed, 06 Mar 2024 22:41:52 -0500 New insights into how viruses disrupt heart function and lead to sudden cardiac deaths
五味子酚抑制小鼠细胞因子风暴和急性肺损伤细胞因子风暴（CS）是一种急性全身炎症反应，迄今为止有效的干预措施有限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Schisanhenol-suppresses-cytokine-storm-and-acute-lung-injury-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Schisanhenol-suppresses-cytokine-storm-and-acute-lung-injury-in-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=76c1ce6a-1d6a-45b0-9bdb-9af38df745fc Wed, 06 Mar 2024 22:35:59 -0500 Schisanhenol suppresses cytokine storm and acute lung injury in mice
退伍军人在大流行后面临疲劳和残疾，无论有或没有 COVID-19 病史感染 COVID-19 后 18 个月的退伍军人表现出与未感染者相似的日常生活活动水平，表明该病毒对该群体的长期功能影响很小。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Veterans-face-fatigue-and-disability-post-pandemic-with-or-without-COVID-19-history.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Veterans-face-fatigue-and-disability-post-pandemic-with-or-without-COVID-19-history.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=40354028-82f4-48c7-a1ca-c46391597470 Wed, 06 Mar 2024 22:31:00 -0500 Veterans face fatigue and disability post-pandemic, with or without COVID-19 history
